long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TFW allows you to organize the Twitch streamers you follow the way you want. Sort them out by folders, content, and have a better overview.

Current version allows you to mark your favourite channels so they always show up on top! Also the ones you mark get synced across computers if you are signed in your browser. You can always hide the layout if you don't want it at some point.

Next versions will include better features such as new sortings, custom grouping, and much more.

Full changelog and details on the Github Repo: https://github.com/javimbk/twitch-following-organizer
